explains: v. 供认，招供；承认，坦白；忏悔，告解；聆听忏悔

sentences.en: She was reluctant to confess her ignorance.
sentences.cn: 她不愿意承认自己无知。

sentences.en: "I confess to being a big wuss," she admitted.
sentences.cn: “我承认我是个胆小鬼。”她实话实说。

sentences.en: You just go to the church and confess your sins.
sentences.cn: 你就去教堂忏悔你的罪过吧。
